intro: Awakened by a mysterious light, Yang sets out on a relentless journey through enigmatic realms. Face monstrous enemies and colossal bosses in this thrilling hack-and-slash adventure
description:
On an ordinary night, Yang, a young creature, is caught off guard by a burst of light that floods his room and transports him to a completely different reality. As he surveys his surroundings, two magical doors appear before him, each leading to a hostile and unknown world: a scorching desert filled with danger, and a living forest where countless enemies lurk. Isolated from his reality, Yang must traverse these worlds, face colossal monsters, and uncover the mysteries behind his journey — and the purpose of the force that pulled him from home.

Dynamic Hack-and-Slash – Engage in fast-paced combat that rewards quick reflexes and precision.

Two Distinct Worlds – Choose your path between unique realms, each with exclusive enemies and challenges.

Dark Fairytale Aesthetic – Explore stylized environments filled with dramatic contrasts of light and shadow.
